property.name: dfs.http.address
property.description: The address and the base port where the dfs namenode web ui will listen on. If the port is 0 then the server will start on a free port.

property.name: dfs.https.address
property.description: The address and the base port where the dfs namenode secure web ui will listen on. If the port is 0 then the server will start on a free port.

property.name: dfs.replication
property.description: Default block replication. The actual number of replications can be specified when the file is created. The default is used if replication is not specified in create time.

property.name: dfs.block.size
property.description: The default block size for new files.
